ygData.subject: RE: poa question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 11 hour Hate trip, half bubble up despite 3 deaths (having a monk and 2 rogues in the party will do that :).  Killed the maestro, and I was the only bard
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 28 Feb 2000, JasonF wrote:
>
> Still 47th from spending so much time in Planes. But hey, I actually came
> out of a 12 hour Hate trip half a bubble UP in experience. No Imbrued
> dropped at all though and we didn't quite get to the Meastro. :-/ I have
> the BP but nothing else at this point.

11 hour Hate trip, half bubble up despite 3 deaths (having a
monk and 2 rogues in the party will do that :). Killed the
maestro, and I was the only bard there without a six-note
blade, so it defaulted to me. :)

I was disappointed with the armor drop rate though. We had
about 35 people there, and got 5 armor drops for the
night.

(35 people) * (11 hours/person) / 5 pieces =
= 77 hours per piece
= 7 hate trips per piece

I'm *not* looking forward to 42 Hate trips to get all the
pieces of imbrued.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
